a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: People left homeless from natural disasters, All disasters, 1900 to
Global number of people left homeless from natural disaster events. This is defined as "number of people whose house is
destroyed or heavily damaged and therefore need shelter after an event."
Note: Data includes disasters recorded up to April 2024.
